text:
@realDonaldTrump @POTUS @AlexAzar There are families that need financial help. Even some who makes good money need help. This is a good time to pass another round of stimulus checks for the average American. #WeInThisTogether #COVID19 
😷😷😷 we home staying safe but we also have needs. #NoWork #AmericaStrong
